title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description:
1. Gather and document the project requirements, including the types of user interactions to analyze (e.g., clicks, hovers, scrolls, eye-tracking), the software applications to support (web, mobile, desktop, VR), the desired insights and suggestions (e.g., potential pain points, areas for improvement, user sentiment analysis), any platform specific requirements, and any other relevant constraints or considerations.
2. Research existing tools and methodologies in the field of UX analysis and competitor analysis to ensure our tool is competitive, provides unique value, and addresses unmet needs.
3. Collaborate with the design team and other stakeholders (e.g., product managers, researchers) to understand their needs, requirements, and ensure our tool's output can be easily integrated into various workflows and platforms.
4. Create a comprehensive project roadmap outlining milestones, dependencies, and timelines.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components for capturing user interactions, analyzing data, generating insights and suggestions, and presenting the results to users.

title: Develop Data Collection Module
description: Implement the module responsible for capturing and recording user interactions with software applications.

title: Develop Data Analysis Module
description: Implement the module responsible for analyzing the collected user interaction data and generating insights and suggestions for improving user experience and interface design.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for presenting the insights and suggestions generated by the system, as well as any necessary configuration or settings interfaces.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions for storing user interaction data, analysis results, and any other relevant data.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Implement appropriate security measures and access controls to ensure the privacy and protection of user interaction data and analysis results.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure and implement a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the project, including automated testing, building, and deployment processes.

title: Develop Test Suite and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Create a comprehensive test suite and quality assurance plan to ensure the system's functionality, performance, and reliability.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Document the system's architecture, components, APIs, and other technical aspects to facilitate development, maintenance, and future enhancements.
